name: Forgotten Hill Mementoes
description:
Collect snippets of Forgotten Hill memory going through the stories of its most mysterious residents.
Together with an ancient spirit you'll face a dark journey in the past to discover new disturbing mysteries. Can you survive?Forgotten Hill Mementoes Main Features
  • 5 different chapters set inside Forgotten Hill memory, including the newest part - "Mischief Night"
  • attractive graphics that will completely involve you in the story
  • grotesque characters and a long compelling story
  • tons of puzzles and riddles to test your brain skills
  • all text and dialogues translated in 9 languages: english, spanish, portoguese, french, italian, german, russian, chinese and korean
  • our new exclusive hint system, if you are stuck a simple click will provide you some help
  • tons of achievements: can you find all of them?
